Package org.penateam

package org.penateam
  • Class
    Description
    Animal
    This is abstract base class for animal entity that we will be using
    Enclosure<T extends Animal>
    Class that hold one class of Animal 
    var mixedEnclosure = new Enclosure<>();

var lion = new Lion("Simba", 5);
var panda = new Panda("Po", 3);

mixedEnclosure.addAnimal(lion);
mixedEnclosure.addAnimal(panda);

if (!mixedEnclosure.isEmpty() && mixedEnclosure.safeForPetting()) {
    mixedEnclosure.feed();
}
    InvalidAgeException
    Exception class for invalid age (age less than 0) This class extend the exception class.
    Lion
    Class for Lion entity
    Panda
    Class for Panda entity
